name: BRUTAL SHOOTER
description:
BRUTAL SHOOTER is a DOOM Styled first person shooter where you the player is a robot that has been sent to kill the zombies invading the world. Rumers suggest that the zombies are controlled by some sort of a Super Zombie that caused the zombies to prevail in the first place.

This is just a DEMO version of the game you can only play the first level of the game and when you reach the end it loops back again, please give honest feedback about what do you think about this game. I need feedback to improve the game and make it better!

I hope you have fun! :)

Also,  feel free to make YouTube videos about this game!
